channel.title: Funny facebook pages?
channel.description:
Well, exactly what the title implies.
Post some funny facebook pages you've found.
My favorite (that I made): http://funnytalks.com/66157

item.title: Funny facebook pages?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:15, topic:379734”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=475576.msg3480918#msg3480918 date=1296109281]
[/img]http://coolmaterial.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/history-facebook-updates.jpg[/img]
[/quote]
I never liked that pic because it says
“145 years ago”
then
“45 minutes ago”[/quote]

We can never be perfect when making something funny though.

Read full topic

item.title: Funny facebook pages?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:10, topic:379734”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=475576.msg3479581#msg3479581 date=1295993452]

You have 2 fucking friends, so only 2 people accepted your request.
/failedtroll

I remove them. Want me to get some more? K. No need to get your panties in a bunch.

[quote]Justin sẽ Beiber bao giờ đến tuổi dậy thì[/quote] translates to [quote]Justin Beiber will never hit puberty[/quote] haha…

I have a fake facebook, everything on it is complete bullshit. I request people to be my friend, and for some reason they always accept… My name is “IgotAhugeCock L. Barreig” … Here are some of my pictures, some of them are pretty funny while others are fuckin weird.

here.

That “black guy” you’re making fun of on your picture is most likely more successful than you are. I am subscribed to him on youtube, and he has a lot of apple products, and he’s part of the US military.

Cool story bro. I took a screenshot because of his lips. They looked funny. Idc about his life, nor was I making fun of him.
[/quote]
“weird they arent extinct yet”
Sure you weren’t.[/quote]

He was making fun of all black people in general.

Read full topic

item.title: Funny facebook pages?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:4, topic:379734”]“EVERYDAY, I fight back the urge to text you or talk to you, telling myself that if you wanted to talk to me, YOU WOULD.”
THIS SHIT MAKES ME WANT TO EAT GLASS.[/quote]

Ignore the whiny bitches.

Read full topic

item.title: Funny facebook pages?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:2, topic:379734”]1: That website is full of scene’s and emos, making all that “He broke my heart, he lied, I fucked a plunger”
2: You didn’t make that joke, the source is unknown, but I’ve seen it before that like page was created.
3: Facebook like pages usually aren’t funny, or people trying too hard to be funny (don’t you hate it when you walk outside and someone throws a refrigerator at you?)[/quote]

@1: LOL
@2: Nope… My friend showed this to me on Friday at school. I decided to make this page after it.
@3: Actually, I love that.

Read full topic

item.title: Funny facebook pages?
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

1: That website is full of scene’s and emos, making all that “He broke my heart, he lied, I fucked a plunger”
2: You didn’t make that joke, the source is unknown, but I’ve seen it before that like page was created.
3: Facebook like pages usually aren’t funny, or people trying too hard to be funny (don’t you hate it when you walk outside and someone throws a refrigerator at you?)

Read full topic
